content: I used to love the game, and played for two years - however after a six month hiatus, I was a bit shocked at how much harder it became to clear MAIN STORY QUEST CONTENT with my old units. Endgame with my old characters is impossible. I stopped caring about that - but for power creep to get bad enough to where my old characters were struggling to clear MAIN STORY CONTENT is unacceptable. I have to pull new units to keep up with clearing the main story, and not even endgame content. Scummy.

Game looks good visually, but is not worth your time in the end. This game focuses way too much on "teams" instead of individual characters. Meaning that if you like a specific character, but don't necessarily like the "team" that the developers intended that character to be played with, you'd be better off just not picking up that character at all, because their performance will likely be drastically reduced outside of that team. I won't even speak on the horrible monetization practices.

Played the game since launch. Uninstalled when Cyrene was released, though I disliked the game for a while before that. Power creep speed is ludicrous, character design has become lazy (many characters grant their buffsadvantages just by existing, no thought or gameplay required), even old sustain units are being crept by both increased enemy damage and increased enemy health pools to compensate for new sustains' offensive capabilities. Not to mention the story being needlessly verbose.

I tried to give this game the benefit of the doubt.I actually did love it in the beginning and invested a lot of time into it. however, as each patch came out, I really did find the story tedious with all the yap. Oh god, it never ended. i started to just not play it as much cuz I got tired of how much they talked. Then the global passive came out. And that was the final nail in the coffin. not including that, the animations whenever they talk are so lazy. When I compare it to Wuwa.

After not playing for half a year, I logged in to start playing again. But when I got on, the game started me from the beginning, and my account had a different UID. I've tried to get my original account back, but even though I've submitted forms detailing the exact dates I got some of the characters, I keep getting replies that they can't prove it's my account. I wrote down the exact date I finished a few of the quests, and nothing. It's very frustrating to know I may not get my account back.

I as a Honkai Impact 3rd player. I suppose I was confused when I assumed this would be an action RPG, even if it was turn-based. NPC dialog generator, (click pain.) Cutscene simulator, (No skip.) Walking simulator,(teleport.) Scavenger hunt simulator, (get what?, find who?) Relationship simulator, (did the NPC send me a text?) Menu navigation simulator, (so many submenus.) Turn-based combat, (it's in there somewhere, it's automatic and you can repeat it.) It's pretty and it sounds good

Rating two because gacha wise this is one of the most soul crushing experiences I've had. A F2p nightmare. I want to cry. Cut scenes progressing through the game or while "grinding" for gems are un-skippable making it take an ungodly amount of time to save up for one multi(at least 4-5 hours if hyper focused), then the rates are so bad It makes all that feel for nothing. Edit: Came back to check on state of the game only got worse especially the power creeping 1...avoid if your not rich

The game has interesting stories and characters, plenty of fun mini-games, and an innovative currency war system. However, all the good points are overshadowed by serious flaws that make the overall experience frustrating. The gameplay quickly becomes boring and repetitive, and it takes way too long to gather resources. The gacha system feels punishing, losing 5050 and even 7525 multiple times in a row really kills motivation. The powercreep is getting worse.

Update: it's been a long time since my initial happy and satisfied review but at this point I genuinely cannot recommend this game. the ongoing narrative is underwhelming and bad, combat has been reduced to just having the newest strongest units in the game requiring zero strategy and content has been incredibly light. if you're looking for a good turn based RPG just look into Expedition or Trails please this is not worth your time. hoping the last story patch delivers but if not I'm dropping.

Irritating lack of effort on the game's part. Keeps saying "Login error occurred. Please try again later. Error code 10011." for 6 times already. Well, if this mobile game will reject me with my mobile data right now, then I'll put my future money on another mobile game instead, one that doesn't just reject login over a weakened internet.

Interesting plot and lore, especially Amphoreus arc. However, there are suspicious designs - for example, it was not explicitly stated why Cyrene adheres to wedding themes. The aforementioned issue is not as troubling as endgame experience. The difficulty is clearly artificial, with bosses having absurd hp and toughness values. At the same time, the damage dealt by them is enough to wipe out whole team. This happens a lot given enemies' number of actions taken. 500 characters is not enough

I was pissed off. I can't make an account , while in the middle of filling out the things needed, it always says "invalid parameter" when I was trying to make a password for the account. PLEASE FIX THIS BECAUSE I BADLY WANTED TO PLAY HSR. Additionally, it says too that it needed to be refreshed because of so many pages LIKE WDYM BRO? I JUST STARTED MAKING AN ACCOUNT AND THIS WILL BE THE FIRST THING THAT WILL CAME UP.

I really like the game, and I reached equilibrium level 6 a while ago, it was a nice challenge but then a bunch of new game modes came and they just got harder and harder, I couldn't progress in the story anymore because I couldn't beat the bosses, even tho I was really interested in it, it left me with almost nothing to do since my characters were just too weak, I tried to strengthen them but I don't have enough time nor luck, so I really hope we can change our equilibrium level in the future.

This game suffers from a lot more problems than all the other Hoyo games. I believe this one has more of them, like, the repetitive arcs , repetitive locations for said arcs (Penacony final act, it was milked to death) , the ridiculous HP inflation it would make the Venezuelan economy blush, not to mention the insane power creep that exists. All and all this game was pretty okay when it came out but later lost the ball. If you are looking forward to this game, I'll save you the trouble. Don't.

the story is great but there's terrible powercreep and minimal eventsgameplay to do outside of the endgame abyss rotations. Powercreep and carelessly made units are becoming way too common, and despite being a whale previously, I have stopped spending on the game as I cannot support the predatory character kits which have core components locked behind multiple copies of a character.

The challenging modes are not friendly often revolve around excessive difficulty, reliance on specific gacha units for success. Must make difficult choices on which characters to invest in, as resources are scarce. Wrong decision can severely hamper their ability to progress in challenging modes. Although the game's story content and mini games are highly accessible, its endgame modes are intentionally designed to be difficult tests of player investment.

I truly do enjoy the story and characters of this game, and the game mechanics are fun, I have very fond memories of this game. However, during the recent updates it has simply become almost completely inaccessible for any f2p player, and I'm not even f2p myself as I have already spent over 300 on this game pulling for characters that were deemed as "must-haves", just for them to fall off meta entirely within the next few patches.. I love this game but I can't recommend it for any f2p

Game has gone super downhill coming from a player since launch. Characters rotating out of the meta faster than the seasons are changing, endgame content enemy health bars are only inflating more and more every patch making my older characters unusable, really bad monetisation and zero new 4 star characters since Moze. Cyrene is almost the last nail in the coffin for me. a character that has to be E2 or is just unplayable. yeah the free stuff is cool but what's the point when it'll just rotate?

The recent performance of this game in the whole 3.0 version makes it a game I won't recommend anyone to come in Hoyoverse is coming up with more and more characters with more crazy damage, stronger and stronger pve power, and the boss' hitpoint has been multiplied for 10 times within a single version in 3.0 The reason is very simple: they want to sell characters and gain that they'll never satisfy, they don't care about player's voice at all DO NOT TOP IN A SINGLE TO CAPITALISM

the game was good at first but the storage is insaine and if your ready to spend HOURS in the game and then updates later have all the time you spent mean NOTHING... the good luck go ahead. im still playing it cus....cope....but seriously this game is so speedy and its graphics and designs is good and all but if you want to be f2p....just dont play or quit

Rng is terrible in this game for both characters and gear. The past update for the story was all cut scenes with one fight. It's more like a visual puzzle and reused material. End game bosses are constantly recycled and only made to be more incredibly difficult with each update. When my account was new it did get a little lucky with getting at character while at 20 pitty. Since then it's been 70 pulls and losing 5050. They changed their Auto battle setting or something and made it brain dead.

The rates are so goddamn awful. Not a single 5050 win in 5 patches, losing 7 times in a row is not fun. Games are supposed to be fun, well not only is the content boring and repetitive, the only aspect of the game that I would even be a little interested in, which is gacha, has awful rates and the way banners are set up is predatory af right now. At least genshin has a CR. It's just 5 stars and 5 stars each after the other, hey, I'm sure you're not low on money, chill down a bit?

Time to update this review because the actual situation of the game is deplorable, the worst it has ever been so far. Extremely p2w in new game modes, savage lack of alternatives for f2p players with no new 4 characters in more than a year, insultingly bad story, rampant character favoritism, lackluster events, no old characters buffs, very little role playing to have if any at all and more issues all around really. Can't recommend it like this, hopefully they fix this mess soon.

I don't want to do this but your game deserves this after what's happening with all the HP inflation in the end game contents!!!! You might as well just put a label "only fun when you pay and get all the new characters every update" when starting the game! Not to mention that grinding relics is just despicably disappointing!!! Might as well add an option to just usedump fuel to finish dailies instead of actually using it to grind since the results are always trash!!!!

I want to like HSR since I like Genshin but it's oversaturated with lore that is pointlessly extensive. The main story being really long is okay but every minigame or extra branch in the world does not need novel-lengths of text. The menu and every game mechanic is also needlessly complex, convoluted and there's far too much going on. Theres no way things couldnt have been handled more efficiently and cleanly.

At this point, there are times you have to say enough is enough. I've been playing this game since Luocha was first released. I enjoyed the story, but recently, they have been getting way too greedy. From the lack of 4 stars to the multibanners, especially for the next patch coming up, they only seem to care about milking their players of as much cash. After finishing the story next patch, I'm dropping this whole game entirely.

The greed of this company is simply unmatched. All of the decisions related to the monetization and exponential power spike of the game have been very disheartening. What is strange is how the critiques and concerns from players about the games health are not been acknowledged or even considered. It is quite sad to see as the game itself is of high quality and can be fun but hoyoverse seems like they want to sour the experience.

The greed of the devs is starting to show with the 3.8 livestream showing we have 2 EXTRA weeks and ONLY 2 events in the entire patch. Showing an old planets story from a different perspective and updating endgame that was ALREADY updated every other week doesnt cancel it out. Unfortunately I have to wait until 4.0 to see if I should even keep playing at this point, in the meantime, I'm doing the bare minimum in this game until it gets better.

I really enjoyed playing for almost two years. It's a great game. But the situation with Cyrene really disappointed me. The fact that you need her E2 or premium Castorice team to charge her ultimate faster is insane. And spending-event where you need to spend around 300 to get her weapon skin... And it makes me sad because I love Cyrene, and the fact that devs treated her so badly and seeing how everyone suggests to skip her is just... I really wanted and expected Cyrene to be must-have.

i gave this game a 5 star rating before but after coming back and playing for a few months I am kinda disappointed you need to have the new 5 star characters otherwise you can't complete the end game content and can't get any reward that you need to pull the new characters it's like a cycle that keeps repeating you need to change this cause game is not in a very good spot

For a game that supposedly places alot of emphasis on the story, it is pretty meh. Also hoyo glazing their darling Cyrene, which I think is a really boring Mary sue character, made me stop playing all the more. Only not giving 1 star cos the cut scene animations are actually pretty good. Otherwise, better gachas out there like WuWa or CZN

You can really tell how little effort they put into the presentation, writing, planning, and balance of the game. The game is basically a scam to try to wring the player base for all they're worth while giving you slop in return.

I have tried to get my friends main account up to end game content for the last couple of months. Every time I get close, they inflate the HP so much that the old dps barely tickle the bosses, while new characters who could previously do massive chunks of the HP bar now feel mediocre at best. In the next update, they teased Cyrene, an overpowered unit, but intentionally did not show them at low level investments because of how long it takes to ramp up her ult. Good luck trying to catch up.

I used to love this game, great gameplay, lovely visual, and a casual gaming approach with the dailies... Gradually it became really repetitive, and the gacha system started feeling very greedy. Low rating bcoz no new 4 star unit, lot of baiting, bad story visuals and global passive. Remove all this and it will be a 8 out of 10 rating.

Been playing since day 1 updating my rating from 5 down to 1 star. if i were just rating the story, this would have a higher rating for sure. but this is a game, the game element part is disappointing, even as someone who enjoy turn-based combat games. locking crucial abilities behind eidolons lightcone, the insane powercreep that can easily render all the eidolons lightcone you've pulled useless in almost no time.

I've played this game since day one, and I hate where it is now. ridiculous amounts of powercreep, Amphoreus was and is being dragged on way too long, the fact that everything in the game revolves around what's meta is just diabolical. If you're going to have a fast paced meta game like hsr, at least continuously buff old characters. I'm sorry hsr, I've had enough

Good concept, bad execution With the amount of money they have, you would expect GREAT things from this game but no. The story is a 10 hours slop every patch with only 1-2 hours of good in it, the dev cant even spare the time to actually animate even the simplest of scene. Whether its holding an object, or even some simple facial animation. Instead, its hours and hours of repitition between hand on chest pose, empty hand out to give something. The lore IS amazing, too bad hoyo is too lazy.

Abysmal gameplay experience. Cutscene after cutscene. Want to play the game for 10 minutes? No. You'll be stuck skipping cutscenes and moving point to point to get to another cutscene to skip. Okay, so do a side-mission instead. MORE cutscenes. It would be nice if they added a button that said "skip all scenes related to this mission." It wouldn't be so bad if the conversations were actually interesting instead of circling around to saying the same thing. I just wanted to play a turn-based game

Hoyoverse has increasingly powercrept characters even 2 patches apart, and the latest 3.7 patch is greed incarnate, taking a character that's been hyped up for most of the year and putting half the effective kit behind getting at least 3 total copies of her, which is a crazy amount of for a single character. The story in amphoreus has been good, but that doesn't excuse how they've been treating players. Stay away

Returning player here. I have to agree with those who are concerned about power creep. Team building in this game takes a very long timeyou need specific units, Light Cones, and relics. It can take months or even a year to build a solid team. But by the time you're done, that team may already be outdated and unable to clear endgame content. Power creep is understandable if older units can still clear endgame content. But it becomes a problem when enemy HP gets inflated too much.

characters now not only being powercreep but now new characters required pair to work and soon will also be powercreep. So instead of only 1 not being able to use in future update you will now have a team that will not be able to use because of the constant powercreep and partner requirement. As a player since 1.x version, this game has really gone downhill.

Ookay. This used to be my most favourite gacha game. Well, not anymore. In 3.X, the developer's focus clearly shifted from a fine balance between quality and predatory gacha practices to straight-up greed. Events that require you to spend money to get the rewards, account-wide buffs locked behind premium gacha characters, stagnant story that has you stuck in one location for almost a year (even for events), and an insane amount of powercreep accompanied by a gamemode tailored to high spenders.

Character powercreeps every update, not enough jades given to follow META, the absolute need to spend money if you want to follow META or else you'll get left behind, a new content that you can't play if you only got old weak characters, updates that induce FOMO instead of QoL updates that make playing the game more fun, no new 4-star units and no updates to the current ones which are already useless in combat. This is how it feels to have your rear Honkai: Star Railed.

Alright, the latest update was great. The story was great, and I had a blast, but please get your reruns sorted out. I get it with this being the ending of the story, so you get a pass.. but the next storyseason should have every missing character rerun. Characters that haven't shown up at all this year: Jing Yuan, Imbibitor Lunae, Black Swan, Rappa, Aventurine, and Argenti. This also isn't including others that have "shown up" but are the special token grabs, and "special guests".

you want the worst mini games without impossible difficult content for all those units you spent on? I finally quit this. I had to step back and think, and oh boy did this game rob me of my time like no other. maybe the whole combat system can be implemented properly in a different game lol

a very good game, too bad it's ruined by extremely greedy and predatory company. Edit to revise to 1 star, there is no free option anymore, and even the premium units are incomplete, so you are forced to gamble for signature weapons.

Here are the reason why I give 1 star, the planar and relic were so bad that are unplayable, what kind un-need stat for? for it to be primary stat for each upgrade and farming and it become unbearable for what kind fun on that? That made me want to left the game. This is PVE why make it so bad? Also their pull is too bad, always 5050, too greedy for the company

I feel like I want to refund the money that I spent on that express supply pass on my years of playing after the powercreep was much intense that I regret it so much. I set this date as my last supply pass purchase then I think Im done on this game. If they consider redesign everything from the start (from character dmg up to enemies hp) then I think I can change my mind

I've been with HSR ever since the first launch, but right now i've never been disappointed in the entire game, you're just following HI3 with all these tragic stories, especially Amphoreus, i thought HSR was supposed to be like an alternate universe but no, you decided to do it all over again, so disappointing. If you plan to do this over and over again, i know i'm not someone important but i'll quit this game.

It's P2W from the start!! Relic farming is just pointless. Bad enough farming is almost close to impossible to get good stats, to make things worst when yoi get the stats u want, all your points go into the wrong substats. Powercreep excessively so you MUST spend. Plus the dumb kit reworks recently are just pure stupidity. Why make characters at all when they have the most useless kits

the environment still has bugs. you can't see the path you walk. in story modesend game modestrials. it's been a whole patch since they offer the same response "give me the information about your graphics and your phone, record this, record that). it's like they do not trust you. when you offer the proofs, they ask you to record yourself by restarting the game. you do it. the problem persists while they ask you for proofs again and again. 0 communication and solving skills.

Get back to Belobog. It was probably the best part of the game. Acheron was also quite good. Everything else is lower than mid. Amosomething story is an endless yapping fest. You better off reading real Greece myths than playing that bs. Gameplay improvements? Nope. They care more about selling new powecreep characters. I had much hope when I started the game at release, but now... 0 gameplay improvements in 2 years, characters powecreep monetization, slop story

ok so now you decide Doubling down on the create problems and sell solutions to those problems tactic eh? Classic. Im only in on the game since amphoreus is a reference to one of the best arc in Honkai impact 3rd and now you decide to take advantage and capitalize on that fact by making the newest character (who is based on one of the most iconic character of their own arc in Hi3 which is Elysia) reliant on their 2nd copy. smh, more business, less fun, no more otakus saving the world with this 1

HSR team used to be great but now they only care about selling char and powercreep is unreal. I played since luofu release until now and did spend alot in this game, playing 2 accts because I really loved the game. Well, not anymore. Cyrene and so many other problems in the game are ignored and the non stop recycling of the same event over and over is getting old.

absolutely pathetic job. often the highest revenue game but that money is no where to be seen, by far the laziest damn developers in terms of what's in the game verse the money on hand. Shared animations, no voice acting in scenes, stiff recycled movements in cutscenes. every character share one of four animation skeletons. all could have been acceptable if patched over, but by now clearly that won't happen. the recent patch has by far the worst story update this game has ever put to screen.

Very disappointed with the latest livestream about 3.7 and cyrene overall. I was so excited about her and she ended up having a chunky kit where her E2 is a must and just nothing unique about it. Events barely as well... It seems 3.7 has only one? And I really hope they won't ruin the story in 3.7. Maybe the hsr developers need to stop getting to comfortable and actually listen to the fans and feedback.

Developer is getting greedy, making a character that is most comfortable at e2, basically make a problem and sell the solution. not to mention the whole 3.7 banner is just Cyrene and her whole best team in one half of a patch together, not all players can spend the moneyjades for that much characterslc, especially ones that wants a full team. Cyrene is a heavily anticipated character and hoyo managed to ruin her. notes: the e5 Cyrene used in the livestream for 3.7 update is just more proof.

Im player D1 of this game. Recent patch is not impress and make me disappoint. Dev never learned from they past game and dont care about player comments. Storytelling and presentation is worst. Character still talk the same dialog without any valuable,it's make me really boring and dont want to read story. Rate gacha also bad, I understand is normally for gacha game but it's still not fair for other player. Which character I want I almost get it with garantee like 90. Go get 1 star dude :(((((

1 year has passed since I stopped playing the game and when I came back for the Evernight banner not a single team I have can clear any endgame content, pwercreep is actually BS in this game; Also, error 10011 keeps happening dispite every other game I have loads just fine

ok, honestly the gear grind is still hard sometimes. but they are making an honest effort to help out with new items, quick farm and events that give gear. story is good too. I gotta side against the hate at the moment. keep it up.

graphics arent bad but some character design looks ugly like it was copy paste from genshin. my friend plays HSR and he was a gibberish type of person and he loves to play turn based which i don't really play stuff like this. I play genshin and it's a better game than HSR. So my opinion is I'll give 1 star since it's turned based and inefficient game with confusing battle skills.

I've played this game ever since day 1. It was fun from the beginning specially at Belebog. And 4star chara is still a thing during that time and the challenges were just right. Fastforward today now 4star chara is nowhere to be seen instead it's all 5star-meta-end-game-content challenge which is hard now specially the HP has increased significantly in the game. Lastly the 3.7 stream vid contoversy was the last straw. It was fun while it lasted for 2 years.

Not free to play friendly game, when every unit needs their signature weapon to function, stopped releassing 4 star character, Stopped giving 4 star weapon as alternative of the limited one, even on their own guide if you don't have the limited weapon, they tell you to use another limited one lol, content extremely restricted on what team you need, if you don't have X team gg you can't clear it. Hoyo will never stopped being greedy while being a billionaire company

literally just 10 minutes ago that my acc glitched so much for a few minutes. this is the first time this is happening. all of this happened after i used "support" characters in domain. i can't help but worry my acc got hacked or maybe even my phone(which i hope not)

They have added a character that can revive your entire team even if she herself isn't on the team. The last four star character came out in September 2024. Every patch they add two five stars and every DPS is stronger than the last. Important story beats are resolved off screen (2.1's ending). They intentionally give characters big flaws just to sell you their E2 or lightconeweapon. They ignore player feedback about characters, Mydei is the best example of this. 300 usd for a weapon skin.

Consecutively losing 5050 10 times in a row is not fun. Seems like rates have been tailored to be on the losing end as of recent. Please include systems like "capturing radiance" of Genshin. I'm tired of saving for a long time, skipping multiple banners only to lose everytime on the characters I want.

great comfort game if you know how to avoid the many psychological traps and only play it like a normal rpg (just the story and dont chase metacharacter). dont expect long time viability as f2plow spender unless you want to play the game like a 2nd job

powercreep and hp inflation are still an issue. endgame is too difficult; endgame is revolved around multiple character dupes with their sig lightcones. (mostly newer characters). limited banner reruns take too long to rotate back in, which makes it difficult to build teams. (meta constantly shifts way too much due to end game mechanics) not enough free pull currency to guarantee the new 5 star character with 5 star sig lightcone every patch. this game still has 5644 on the limited banners

I started playing because the characters from 1.0 intrigued me and were usable units up until 3.0. After Amphoreus, the powercreep became too much. It feels like my account is screwed without Tribbie and Phainon, despite me having Sunday, Castorice, and Anaxa. Overall, not worth the money you'll need to spend if you want to have any chance of clearing endgame content.

tried to download the game but took almost 2 hours to download the resources that you need to play. This was while using strong wifi and having a phone that is powerful enough to play any game smoothly

One of the best game or probably the best game I have ever played on a handheld device. Approximately 4 months ago I started playing this game just for the fun of it, but didn't expect such a beautiful story with so many lessons and emotions with insane depth on the characters' story and background in this game. I absolutely love playing this game because of it's great story and the efforts they puts on this game. Thank you hoyoverse and the team assigned for this game. Truly a wonderful game.
Absolutely trash, the game have too much cheaters nowadays especially on story, explore, event, etc. Also no action to ban them from hoyo because it's a single game.

The game does not make sense with the lower difficulty of the currency wars. It should be easy to clear but why am I struggling to clear it. I utilized the strategies but I still do not understand why I cannot clear it. I find it does not make any sense to me why I cannot clear it. Do not let me get started with the damage calculations. I am not sure if they are right either.

The game is good... But there's this disconnection from the players and devs that makes the game just looks like a "give me your money" kind of game... Dont get me wrong tho im still gonna play the game but i REALLY HOPE they listen to the community more and appeal to the players concerns ... Hoyoverse is up there for one of the most top earning companies in the world, so i dont get why they seem so desperate to make more money. i wish i can give 0 stars just to send a word to HoyoverseT-T

I love Honkai: Star Rail but Im really frustrated right now. Bosses became way too hard we used to clear tough fights with 4-star teams, now it feels impossible without 5-stars or perfect relics. Grinding relics is pointless when one bad roll ruins your build. Live streams and showcases use C6 or whale gear, so normal players cant relate.

low effort put into everything that isn't the latest playable character, haven't released a new 4 star in OVER A YEAR and frankly I don't know where their money is going because it's certainly not going back into this game
Power Creep is still there but the story got pretty darn good. they were cooking on that front at least. Also do easy mode for Irontomb... unless you're a whale or god tier artifacts.

well the most recent king battle is terrible. my best teams barely clear the knights and I don't have any capable of even surviving the king apparently. I'm not sure for who or what the point of this mode is but I think I might finally be done with this game. I've been struggling to keep up for awhile now and this is just not even remotely reasonable

HP inflation, greedy marketing and character design. Game is slowly falling off. The only thing carrying this game are the beloved characters. They became the thing they swore not to become (Genshin Impact).

powercreep is harsh, pulls not sufficient, 4 new chars for 2 version, you could only choose one. gacha in this one is really predatory. they even recycle the event and keep recycling the main storyline with the timeline. now it's a complete mess that I even considered to quit this game

Every 42 days you get about 30 mins of event content that basically plays itself and 8 hours of story reading on the level of a children's book. Least engaging game I've ever played once the initial backlog of content dried up.

The lack of things you can do in this game are so bad and terrible. You cant enjoy the character you pulled outside of the endgame contents ,Theres no interaction or even character birthdays like genshin. The story feels disappointing because the developers seem too lazy to create proper animations, relying instead on black screens and long, emotionless dialogues with no visual expression.

A newly released healer under the guise of remembrance dealing more damage than 99 of all previous versions dps and heals more than any previous versions healers. And you need this unit and its lightcone to clear the latest endgame. Welcome to HSR, crazy power creep where the devs actually actively destroys 99 of previous characters to force you to pull for latest units and their lightcone. And your shiny new units? Probably dead in 6 months. This game is so not worth it.

U guys sure make lot of awesome characters, gameplay, music, even the boss are absolutely peak which is nice.. but 1 thing that really made me mad is Substats roll which is rely on stupid high RNG... no matter how many resources i spend and even using a custom relic to get my desire stats (such as Crt ratedmg) which is require a luxury item that u only got 2-4 time per month just for a stupid piece of junk.. this is ridiculous and wasting a recourses better just remove the relic system..

the new endgame is annoying. powercreep if you don't have Castorice or Phainon, you're screwed. The game punishes you if you don't have specific you can't use pervious units and story for Amphoreus is overrated is dragged for so long I don't care anymore I don't recommend this game you sink your money your pervious units are useless after Mydei will delete this they don't treat their players well. they don't buff older units much and they don't rerun

Unless you pull for the most recent characters, you cannot clear the endgame content. not only that, there are absolutely NO events and the patches are always so dry. Even the event that takes the entire patch (over 40 days) can be cleared in a couple of hours.

Here's my take to HSR since day 1. The game has similar vibes with GI and HI3. The graphics is nice, characters and VA are topnotch, gameplay is smooth and lots of events and rewards. Powercreep is barely felt since you can clear most of the content using basic units. Downsides are after you clear all the quests there's nothing much to do. Lack of content. Farming good equipment with good stats is extremely difficult. You also need to build a lot of characters to be able to join MoC(Abyss).
The game doesn't work on a Chromebook. The screen is a pink and black mess that doesn't allow you to see anything. Either fix the issue, or just remove the game from Chromebook entirely.

This game was off to a great start, with abundant rewards, an interesting story (in belobog specifically), and pretty tame powercreep. This only lasted up until 2.0, however, with each month presenting a new, much stronger character that, if it was a support, you were forced to buy, if you wanted to keep up with the endgame content. The story went from simple but interesting to convoluted, confusing, only there to waste your time with its endless dialogue. I'd continue, but there's a size limit.

Power creep has been pretty atrocious lately. What's the point of having an elemental weakness system but gets ignored by a few select characters because you want to promote a singular playstyle? Horrible experience for free to play player. You can't clear the content without pulling for the newest characters and they don't give up enough pulls to do so. I tried giving this game a few chances, the new update was the last time..

Day 1 player here. I absolutely loved this game when it came out, and from 1.0 to 2.0, this game was magical, even with it's bumps here and there. It was honestly a 5 game. Ever since 2.1 this game has slowly become a big slog to me, both gameplay wise and storycharacter wise. Stopped playing with 3.0 when I tried to weather the storm thinking Amphoreus would be a change of scenery and pace. But with so much recasting and needing new characters, it is just unfun.

This game has gone downhill. It's been so tiresome trying to beat any of the endgame stuff, due to power-creep and needing new characters that I have no interest in. Even the story is having issues. Penacony is where it started getting boring for me. It was nonsensical, obnoxious, and slow. This game had potential, but now, it's just a game to squeeze money out of people.

HSR started strong with great QOL and fun gameplay, but its become more pay-to-win over time. The anniversary really showed how greedy the devs can be, pushing spending instead of rewarding players. Power creep makes older units feel useless, and the game feels stale despite its polish. I loved it at launch, but unless they fix monetization and balance, its hard to recommend.

Gameplay used to be fun. Elemental weaknesses encouraged diverse teams. However, all of that has been scrapped in favor of newer, pay to win, all encompassing units that break the game. I really enjoyed this one for the first year after launch and a little after; but we've reached a point where HP inflation and character powercreep has become abhorrent. Safe to say I had my fun, but I'm not coming back to this one.

This game's going in a terrible direction. It's power creep central in Star Rail. as long as you're cool with pulling every character the game still feels fun for the most part, but these devs are the worst at balancing their game. I've never seen such a shameless power creep, it's non-stop and too hard to keep up with every month. I love Star Rail, but it has left an awful taste in my mouth in recent months and doesn't hit like it used to at all. It feels like all they know is power-creeping.
Changing my review, still 1 star since there's little to none events to even secure the collab characters.

The writing quality has gone VERY downhill in the last few months. The english voice acting is a disaster, half of the cast doesn't even have a voice in the most recent update. In 2025 the game is in a much worse state than 2024 and 2023. The game power-creep issue has increased to unbearable levels, especially if you love playing the endgame modes like MOC, PF, AS. If you're not lucky enough to get the newest toy, oh well then you're doomed. As for the story, the amount of unnecessary yapping and 8-12 hours of just idle animation characters and no voice acting for some of the main characters like Dan Heng, the lack of cutscenes and the very elongated story. It's bad.

There's like 5-6 different reasons why this game is turning into a mess but I'll stick to the universal problems. I know it is a gacha but the way they are shilling new characters and phasing out the old ones is a big indicator of their predatory behaviour. New events give very few rewards compared to the beginning of the game. Endgame content suffers from artificial difficulty with enemies becoming bigger hp sponges with each patch. This is becoming a big casino from a turn-based rpg game.

The good: Game is absolutely gorgeous, runs well, story is compelling and the gameplay is fun and well thought out. The bad: too many pointless side events with no progress added to the actual story(since launch), Laughable rewards that provide very little to no benefit. No co-op or arena mode. My biggest issue is the gacha system. Even after buying monthly passes YOU WILL NEVER get the newly released characters. There is no pity meter and not enough currency given to draw them. No drop rates.

After playing HSR since day 1 the game is going to the point of intense powercreep. HP inflation in endgame content, new mobs catered to new characters only making old characters obsolete, lore getting boring and new characters potential are locked in their duplicate and BiS weapon making it necessary to get them. Overall the game has a lot of flaws but its still enjoyable but as a warning don't try to invest too much because the game is about to take the road of powercreep similar with HI3.

The game is pretty good, the graphics are so beautiful and it doesn't lag on my potato phone but there is this one problem that is very annoying. When I try to play the game it just keeps putting me back to my home screen over and over again until I restarted my phone, miraculously it works!, For a few hours. Then when I want to play the game again it happens...again!! I don't know if it's the storage location(its in my SD because I have no more storage) or its some glitch but pls fix!

Game is alright. I did want a rpg and the graphics and combat mechanics are decent but it is lacking a lot of interactive gameplay outside of the main story. So far daily quests are just talking to npcs and I just had 1 which involved combat...hopefully they step up their game and offer more variety of daily missions. There are a few dungeon type modes that are for long term progression

I've played the game for around three months now, and it's amazing. Both are on mobile and desktop. The characters and the story are amazing, and the gacha system for characters is (in my opinion) amazing, with the option to be f2p and still (with small amounts of grinding) be able to get the characters you want. Amazing game, literally in love with man. IT MAKES ME SO HAPPY. :3

Really loved the first few worlds, it felt like there was a lot of heart in it. Now it just feels overly complicated for the sake of it, the dialogue has become a yapfest (the fact that there's still no skip button is insane) and the powercreep is so bad that it's almost impossible to use older characters..plus adding global passives?? Shame cause I used to love playing this :(( I used to love hoyo games, but I can't support them anymore. They dont listen to nor care about their players.

It takes forever to build 1 character. The artifacts (which is used to make your characters do more damage) is so RNG based that it's literally impossible to build them unless you plan on spending thousands of dollars on this game. Then the next update the character will be useless because they buff enemies or release a better version of the character to force you to spend more money.

Literally unplayable for me, it might have something to do with my mobile device, (its a android tablet). But there's nothing wrong with it, I have more than a hundred gigs left of storage after getting this, my wifi connection is strong, and I have 4 gigs of ram, which was supposedly the right amount to run this game, I don't know what the problem is. Lastly, I can't see the train whatsoever, it's not there, also, the lag is very strong and the playable area isn't rendered, optimize for mobile

Making new character releases absurdly better than the old ones ruined the game balance and the state of combat is in absolute shambles now, too much powercreep ruined the game. The writing for story has also gotten way worse, as it takes too much time and has massive dialogue bloat to deliver a story that quite frankly should be taking half of the time than it currently does. Also, there's no evolution when it comes to the game state, it's the same game as it was during launch but worse.

Edit: It pains me to do this but I feel like it has to be done. The game is in a very poor state and with Castorice (an upcoming character as this edit) with an incredible predator passive locked on a limited character, the game is going downhill. The story is great imo and I love the gameplay, but the way the game is going is very bad and hope this makes a bit of a difference to try to divert is upcoming disaster

i really like this game, but I've really tired of the glitches. i can't complete the quest, because when the dialogue starts, my screen starts to lag and then game crushes. the same thing about the Herta's worlds, when i approach the level with boss - it's all crushes, so I can't complete it. i need to close and open game about 4-5 times, so it may work. maybe the issue is the model of my phone, maybe some another thing, but it really kills the game experience. just sharing. thank you

Originally rated this game 5 stars, but the game has become so terrible as of late. I've never spent money on this game, and A LOT of my old characters struggle to do any of the new content, forcing me to pull new ones that I'm sure will become redundant later on. I understand releasing stronger characters to sell more characters but do the old characters have to become useless? I've been playing since 1.0 and adore this game, but it's become way too stressful to handle nowadays.

GraphicsStoryFinal boss fight - loving it. BUT the game got an identity crisis. It's like an open world - but not really, it like and rpg - but not really, it's like a turn-based but not really. Smooth performance on my phone, no bugs. Things I really don't like: no ability to skip dialogue. Also, very very long Genshen style bounties. Definitely nothing like a typical mobile turn-based gacha. Be prepared for a 15 mins of fighting vs 2 hrs of dialogue. Drop rates are Horrible!

A tragic shell of what it once was. There was plenty to love about Star Rail when it first released. As time went on instead of adding features to make the gameplay less shallow and mind numbing, it's once again a solemn tale of yet another gacha making its money and then opening the floodgates for game breaking characters. What hurts is there was plenty of good. Music, Animations, Story. Tarnished. Squandered. Ruined. All because of the allure of cash.

Since version 3.1 has been released I've tried to play the new story with Mydei on my phone, but the app keeps crashing and kicking me out of the game in the beginning of Mydei's POV. I think I've restarted the gameapp at least 20 times by now, but nothing changes. Reply to devs reply: Contact via in-game-mail? And how am I supposed to do that when I'm getting kicked out all the time???

Honestly the people who say the game is awesome probably are blind, in the last year the Power creep has been out of control, 1.0 characters are useless by this point and 2.0 characters are starting to feel underwhelming. The end game content doesn't help, instead of challenging battles they are just dps checks. This game is not f2p friendly, it doesn't matter if the game gives you 75 pulls per version if you can't get the five star unit you want or if the characters are going to get powercreep

I'm gonna warn to all new players. If you're interested or thinking about playing this game... then you are making a huge mistake and you will regret it. This game over the years became very pay to win and powercreeps are extremely common here now, the fear of missing out is real. Don't get me started on the lack of a skip button on a 3 hour story quest, which doesn't do any better. To be blunt, the developers are all just out of touch with reality and the management just wants the profit.

A once pretty good game, ruined by a company too damn money hungry and greedy to see anything other than dollar signs, powercreep and hp inflated enemies plague this game, along with a story that's written and told so poorly it takes 8 hours to get to the point, units you once loved for their good character designs and back story becoming obsolete or needing insane levels of investment just to keep up in endgame content...just take it from me, save you time and money and don't play this game.

I stopped being able to login to play on my account , I contacted customer support and they did not offer any solution. Quite horrible after I had been playing my account for days till the night before Even after contacting customer support via email they still have not helped me 3 months of waiting and no progress when I have all login credentials.

The game is very good, as a player i really enjoy playing no lag recently but as the new version came in I've been encountering problems but most of all when i launch the app, when i go to the train part it just stop responding or it said that it's stopped, so i wished that this error will fix as soon as possible ---------------------------------------- Nevermind my phone just sucks and sorry for not noticing ZEHAHAHA great game after all and it's got more rewards than usual.

Seriously it's time to add a Skip button for those long and tedious dialogues, not everyone has the patience to sit through them for hours. Other than that as a new player i have a lot of problems with some of the content difficulty: it's either too easy at times or too difficult ( mostly bc i don't have those OP five-star characters, summoning currency is too scarce and rates are abysmal)

The game was fun and all until the 1.1 update, What happened to the textures? No floors, no walls, only the characters. I can't play properly anymore. It takes too long to login. I restarted, reinstalled, but there was no change. I guess it was fun while it lasted.

Good and challenging game, but it keeps crashing. Once or twice is fine, but when I have to go through a boss fight, and the boss has 5 health left only for the game to crash and I have to do it all over again...it's beyond frustrating and really ruins the experience.

Overall it is a great game; graphics, story, gameplay, voiceover, system, UI. The only problem is that it doesn't work well on my phone (Infinix Hot 10 Play) even tho its only 10Gb, it often says log in error- or the game just crashes on the title screen, which is kinda weird. Cause Genshin Impact has way more storage and more RAM to consume, yet it works fine on my phone. Probably this game isn't optimaized yet? To all devices such as mine, I hope you'll be able to fix this problem :

Love the game just wish there was backbone support. Too many times I have accidentally zoomed in game when trying to move the character and the camera at the same time. The drops are also bad. You can do six fights in a row for calyx crimsons and get one purple and maybe enough blues to make two purples. We should at least get one purple for each challenge since you need a lot of them for just ONE character.

Due the powercreep I have to build the NEW shiny character from zero and the artifact RNG is tiring Me. I farming on the same spot in a month and never got the single specific gear part that I want. Crafting won't help either. The mold ? Defensive dud sub stats on offensive gear. Because it is a turn based RPG, stats check is all that matters, you can't fill the gap through skill like genshinzzz. I really like this game at first, but now, I am bored.

It's actually sad how much this game and the other Hoyoverse games are a money grabbing pay to win. don't get me wrong, the stories, character, sometimes gameplay is fenominal. but I find myself stuck trying to pass a boss because I haven't paid to fully upgrade my characters. mind you they're all lvl 80 but still seem to not be strong enough. Really ruins the game and I haven't played it since.

Combat is simple but fun with flashy animations. Most of the challenge comes from having the right characters and having them built properly. There's a good auto mode but powercreep is a major issue. Story is subpar. The first major planet is solid but it goes downhill fast from there. No skip button and slow text speed waste your time. It also suffers from poor English localization with grammar errors, text constantly getting cut off, and inconsistent pronoun usage.

agreed with other reviews. Lately, the game felt very dry, even as a player, can sense that developers are not dedicating to this game, very lazy development recently. Also, since 1.0, I have been waiting for multiplayer mode, when is hoyo going to implement it? It is getting very boring without able to play and interact with friends. Please don't count garbage chat system as mean for multiplayer.

Used to like the game despite how easy it is. But the way they keep releasing less and less content, going against what the playerbase wants (shown with the poor rating of 2.6 currently). Plus this patch doesn't like an aniversary (3.2). An aniversary should be the time to have more different gameplay, to be able to play the game more. Instead they give more stuff but no gamemode to use it on. It's a free game, sure, but I base that on what the game used to provide VS what it provides now.

I really like this game but with the recent decision, the game becoming harder to enjoy. The game powercreep is just way too real, the older unit getting less and less relevant with each update is really huge problem, your choice beating those PvE content is getting thinner and thinner. This is really bad decision for the game health and worst this game is only 1.9 years old. You guys really need to think something instead of fixing it with bloating the enemy HP

Hello i really enjoying this game, just i got one problem after v1.1 release there's some bug that always make me cannot log in like lag's texture transparent and error 10013 it's always bother me and sometimes I can't get into the game, even if I can get in there are still problems like excessive lag, texture bug And there are many more, and if possible, please fix the excessive bug and lag as soon as possible

Dont get me wrong, I like this game so much because it is from hoyoverse and I love the character designs but I can't fully enjoy the experience because of lagging, the glitching of most of the places, the missing floor and houses. I often rely on the map to not be stumble in the objects that I cannot see because of these issues. Also the cutscenes is the hardest part because it is very laggy with the sudden fps drop and I started to hate the cutscenes because this always happens to me.

I absolutely love the game fun mechanics, fighting, characters, and animation. But I hate when the game logs me out, logging back in is hell, every action you takemove you make, you are forced to do human verification. But in my case, when I would try to log in, it would say account or password error. I KNOW I HAVE AN ACCOUNT, with that email but it just won't work, it's not the password because I have changed it, then tried to log in afterwards with no luck and it saying the same thing again.

1.0 player here. I'm changing my review of this game since many of the aspects I loved about this game is being abandoned. - The storytelling is becoming convoluted with much of the elements feeling dragged on with little payoff. - The relevency of older characters are diminished, meaning that making long-term investments on characters feel wasted. - The lack of new combat events and modes means that the only end-game combat is limited to a mode that refreshes every 2 weeks. Go elsewhere.

it still gives me the log in error, but i found a way to get in. The game is simple, it's a turn based game, with a fun addition of puzzles in the world. It is a lot faster to open the game, the mechanics are simple to understand (if u have basic rpg knowledge). I love the idea of the break. The quests are easy to maneuver around since it would immediately bring u to the location in the map, all u have to do is teleport. So far I am satisfied with the game (:

Day 1 player with consistent monthly pass from 1.3 until 3.1. I did not struggle in any endgame modes; had consistent clears. It really sucks to see how the game has changed, and not for the better, in the span of 1 year. The amount of bloated dialogue has been insane since Penacony and the shift to make every limited character need their signature LC are both reasons why I've uninstalled after getting Castorice (and probably will never come back until actual change happens).

I been playing ever since it came out and now just looking at 3.0 to 3.3 it's so boring that there's no gameplay and dialog after dialog with blackscreen to tell you the rest of what happen. in my opinion I would prefer to just watch it as a anime instead, plus if I can finish a 30 min Asmongold video and still spaming the skipfast the dialog button then there's a problem here. Manga do miss 1.0 to 1.5 update when everything was amazing. It hurts to do this but they need a wake up call now.

Used to be good. The devs cared and improved the game every update. But ever since 2.0, when the game got more popular again, they immediately switched up, and it's just been getting worse. EDIT: gave the 3.0 update a shot to see if they improved the story, and I can say: HELL NO. Bloated dialog and miserable Endgame experience due to HP-Inflation EDIT2: they just added GLOBAL PASSIVES making essentially unskippable characters. Literally the most predetory thing ever. What a shame

This game is an utter travesty, honestly. The first act is one of the greatest in a gacha game with great pacing and characters, but that's about where my praises end. It's riddled with powercreep, some of the most boring gameplay I've ever seen in a turn based rpg, a grind so boring they give you an autoplay button and so many anti-player practices that it makes EA look like the most generous company to ever exist.

loving the game itself and on my pc I have no problems playing, however on my phone I was only able to play it once. for several days I've been kicked out of the loading screen, right when the game is about so start. I log in, press enter and then it quits. I'm not sure what might be the cause but it's a shame because it seemed to be working well that last time I played it

The game crashes everytime I try to initiate a mission trigger that enters into a cutscene. For example When I go to the mission trigger when investigating Chris for suspicious activity it just freezes and crashes as well as any other similar mission trigger. Please fix because it has become unplayable.

The endgame content became harder because of power creep. Additionally, the Trailblaze missions are so bland and boring, not because of the story but because of how they deliver it. ADD MORE ANIMATED SCENES, SIMPLE BUT GOOD MOVEMENTS IN SOME DIALOGUE, AND GOOD CAMERA ANGLE. Lastly, after hearing some leaks about Castorice that it has a great synergy with Mydei and Tribbie. I just want to uninstall HSR. I wouldn't mind if there were no power creep and I could use non-meta characters.

EDIT: 1.1 offers almost no new content except a childish search for grafiti marked clearly on the map and the museum which is just running back and forth. Minus 1 star. Same quality game designfunctionally and interestingfunny missions as other Mihoyo games. But once you've played through the content gets boring because it doesn't have any of the free exploring and secretschests searching or variation of mini gamespuzzle that Genshin offers and kept me playing back daily for over 2 years.

I had a problem where the network kept failing with wi-fi connection or Data, but it was solved!! The game is fun but powercreep has been a major problem recently. They also added Global Passives, which makes me very uncertain about the future of the game. The Devs can either choose the players or our money.. and I won't give mine.

I could play this game even if it was lag but this bug have been bugging me from the start!The train from the loading screen looks like half complete and the map flickering with the floor and the wall disappearing and appearing again.When I started playing,the only problem was the login.I expected the game will get better in each update but it still feel the same.

This game is pathetic excuse of a turn based game, it's gameplay is very one note and boring, I have never played a turn based game with gameplay this stale. The characters of this game are also very boring and serve only one function, not worth wasting your precious time on. The endgame content of this game is also horrible and so tedious and time consuming. I won't ever recommend this game to anyone.

I used to love this game. I had a strong team build. But after I took a small break from the game, my team or any character isn't viable anymore. I tried many ways to make my DPS usable. But Alas! nothing works as I expected it to. I guess I'll leave the game and make a review here. Farewell, HSR.

I tried to open my account with my new phone and show my account encounter security risk try it later. Its been months when i logged in again and it's still the same issue i contacted customer service support waited for a day and they're gonna tell me to wait more cause the issue might be fixed?? So basically this game saying if you encounter issue with your account better wait for it to resolved on its own, and they won't help you and will just profit from the people without helping them. Sucks

The game is fantastic, great storyline with awesome cutscenes. The game is also generous with items. The thing that disappointed me most is the connection. It always disconnects from time to time sometimes forcing me to replay cutscenes with no skip available. This never happened to me in Genshin and am playing absolutely fine with it so my connection is good. Server needs updating.

No 4stars character in 7 months. 5 stars characters that get powercrept in the span of 4 months. Pay-to-win game due to the end game content that became too hard for old dps, even Acheron!! The addition of mini transaction is also utterly ridiculous! No need to say that this game needs some SERIOUS rethinking.

I really enjoyed this game, great graphics and turn-based gameplay. But why 3 stars? Cuz it took me 4 days for me to not be stuck in the log-in page. I dunno why it keeps saying log-in error, right after I click start. I checked my net, cuz maybe it's the reason why, but its working just fine.

Honkai Star Rail was the best game for me when I started playing it, its been 2 years since it release and for all that ive done in the game is pretty much time spending. Now the reason why I gave it a 1 review is that the game evolved backwards, the story is longer than my own lifespan, and you cant clear content with old characters anymore. and for its anniversary just a spending event and some events to thats just not interesting... I loved hsr, but if the game wil turn deep, its sad........

The game is nice, but it literally has texture and animation defectsbugs. From the simple action of running where a pink shape appears instead of the character, to Abilities and ultimates which make pink squares appear instead of actual character animations. I would have played it, but it takes away the fun.

My phone is in optimal performance when it comes to games as heavy as this one, but HSR keeps on crashing after ver. 1.2 I'm not satisfied with this experience because instead of enjoying the amazing plot line and stories and game play it turns into a nightmare where it suddenly blacks out and crashes mid fight.

The graphics, musics, and storyline is amazing as well alongside the jokes inside. The detail that hyv has put in this game made the game more interesting to play. My previous rating was 45 star but recently i've been encountering many problems. The game mysteriously shut me off mid explore and the game often shows login error. It doesn't happen much before, also it'll be nice if hyv expand the map for wider explore since HSR is a new game with incomplete patches we got bored easily. Good game!

This game is fun, but since I changed to a new phone, this game isnt letting me login to my google account. And when it asks the verification code, it doesnt appear to the time limit of 60 seconds, it always appear at 30 minutes after the code. Im getting frustrated because this is one of my favorite games after genshin and honkai impact. Please fix this issue.

The Amphoreus story has great potential but the developers really did a great job making it so boring and cheap. It's been two years and all we get are generic and overused animations during dialogues. This company has millions of dollars and they can't even add long cutscenes, it shows that they chose to be lazy instead of pushing quality.

Been playing since launch and its safe to say that this game is going downhill fast, the powercreep and grind is just getting worse every update, the QOL updates are focused on important things and not things that players really want like a skip button. as a F2P its gonna get very difficult to catch up to others and be able to blow through end-game content unless u grind at least 12 hrs each day.

I used to play this game like.. everyday but nowadays, I only download it so I can try new events or grind a bit then pull for characters. then I uninstall because it gets too boring after that. With all the characters in the new planet, they constantly keep getting power creeped and honestly, the only people who can play are people who are p2w. F2P players are hardly given good content and even then, hsr tries to make it up with story content and we need you to add a skip button for god's sake.

The game is far too greedy and basic. Having two gacha banners is a terrible move. In addition, the story is poorly written. The characters are, for the most case poorly written and designed. The gameplay is basic with bad power creep and no real overall improvement over time. it us just .... bad.

I played this game for a few days before, it was kind of a newbie account but still has a few characters and stuff that I farmed for. The next day, I log in to find out that my account was completely reset and I couldn't do anything at all. Then, after installing it back this time, I used email 2, which I successfully log in and played almost the same as account 1, but the next day, the account says 'too many requests'. Also tried emailing hoyoverse, found out that they don't care about users.

This game is not worth the timefinancial investment. As a day 1 player, almost all of my units that I spent money pulling for eidolonslightcones and time spent building have been powercrept and don't feel good to play against heavily hp inflateddamage resistant enemies only to diminish their performance to force players to pull for characters they might not like in order to keep up. I would have kept spending money to support the game that I liked if the playing field was even. regret10

I have play more than one year. Let me share the reasons to not play this game: 1. Bad gachapulling rate, at worst case scenario, you need 280 pulls to guarantee an character and hisher signature weapon. 2. Some game mechanics is lock behind limited characters, for example: Topaz, Acheron. 3. Tedious RNGs on gear progression. 4. Serious powercreep and hp inflation problems. 5. No skip buttonfunction for story. 6. Abysmal map design and puzzle. 7. Bad optimization on low end phone.

I love this game and I am a big fan but what differs from playability depending on what device you're playing varies and it is frustrating that on this Samsung Galaxy A16, it plays TERRIBLY!! And worse of all, i looked up about the Samsung Galaxy A16 and it came out last year and I refuse to believe that!! ya'll need to do better with compatibility!!

I really love this game, but version 1.1 is a mess... the lag and constant freezes in combat make the game unplayable no matter the settings. All was perfect before 1.1. I don't have a gaming phone, but i would say that an S22 Ultra is enough. Or it was, in 1.0
The background is pink and black on a Chromebook, but works perfectly fine on my phone. Please fix this or just put that it's not compatible with Chromebooks so it doesn't waste people's time.

Game was great early on but they're playing the long con with this one. The game's current state is poor in terms of story and events and with the upcoming addition of global passives, the game lost any real strategy that isn't "just have x character."

- Very money greedy. Cannot max star newest endgame content (like Apocalyptic Shadow or Memory of Chaos) without pulling for all newest characters (and most of their light cones). - Pretty boring. Some turn based games are still fun even though the 'turn based' aspect makes creating fun content challenging. HSR is not one of them. Always the same thing. Always quickest and easiest way to clear stuff is to whale. Boss mechanics? What's that? Just spend money!

GACHA DROP RATE IS BAD, THE CHANCE YOU WIN ROMOTIONAL CHARACTER IS NOT HIGH. Gameplay is now bad because of "POWERCREEP". Something else are also missing like cancel burst when you don't like to continue the burst, there is no defend option like for example, when attacking enemy which have penalty there is no other option but to attack them ( if DPS characters). Put 120 fps on Android too not only Ios. INCREASE EVENT REWARDS because PULLING GACHA is HARD TO WIN. Also FIX THE RELICS STATS RNG.

played this game since release and recently quit. as a free to play player I physically cannot keep up with the current meta and the power creep makes it impossible to do most content for pulls if you don't have the newest character. After 2.0 the story fell off horribly, to the point I quit in 2.7. genuinely hope they fix these issues but knowing hoyo they won't.

Everything is fine, it would have been a 5-star rating, but there's just one problem, the "STORAGE". The storage of HSR is too large, even if you delete past quests, it's still big. It's just unfortunate for low and mid devices, I hope you can fix that and reduce your storage, that's all.

Won't let me login to my account, reciting a nonsense "security risk" error that Hoyo support has completely failed to address for me, completely giving up on my situation and abandoning me. I suspect the emails were from an automated system, which is just typical--can't even get help from an actual person. EDIT: Replying to the response, I already TRIED to contact Hoyo email support, I was abandoned with the login error unresolved after several email exchanges. Honestly horrendous service.

I love the game honestly but after the update.. it has been acting up. Each time I load the game, the train is half and it loads slowly than usual. My other games loads faster like genshin etc but why wont it open sometimes. I can open it sometimes but its just a black screen. Its very laggy as well

The game just hasn't been captivating. Stopped caring for story, and even then I don't finish it and use the skip features to get into new content. Will no longer play and delete the app, it was a fun ride since day one.

I used to love this game. I started playing back in version 1.4. Back then it was amazing and the story and gameplay pulled me in. However, the game has become frustratingly predatory with more and more updates. HP inflation of bosses from the endgame content is a joke, and you will be needing the new meta characters if you like to clear endgame content. And that's not all, you will be forced to pull for Eidolons to increase a character's overall performance. Hoyo being hoyo, greed takes over.

Played since launch, since then it's gotten stale, relying on the same story beats over and over again. With no rewarding endgame left for me and an overhyped and low effort collaboration event, I'm putting the game down after 2 years.

Upon update with blade, the game is almost unplayable, I have done everything, gone through all the settings, and I can no longer get into battle, it will crash my game every time and now I am unable to play the events and will miss out on a lot of things, for a phone that ran genshin rather fine, this games optimization is terrible and should only be run on a high end phone or phone with a ton of space for the pre-download.

This used my favorite mobile game, but since its first anniversary, it has been on a gradual decline from poor storytelling with bloated dialog, constant black screens, unexpressive animations, and less cutscenes and that's not even getting into the power creep. A new dps gets released almost every update, and they're rarely good for more than 1 update, and now they're trying to release a character that gives you a free revive as long as you own them. This level of greed should not be allowed.

EDIT : Still, a lot of lagging while battle, sometimes the screen when blank while battle, and recently whenever i used Jingyuan ult, my game will automatically went out and crashed, idk why it just happened when i used Jingyuan ult.. also, when doing manual battle, i still cant change the target. It's so hard to swipe the target left and right.. Plus, my sky's game got a lot of black line (it's been fix before but after the recent update, it back again) Pls fix

I honestly enjoyed the game itself along with the characters' lore, arc quests, music, graphics, and boss fights in this game. Not many are fans of the game mechanics, which is worth giving a try since it is very easy to play as an FTP player. I do like the gacha system of this game since weapon banners have their own banners. It is also easy to grind for the charactersweapons of your choice. I would say the only con in this game is that you can't move down from world levels or do coop mode.

19.07.23:Turn based game, more generous gacha than the other games by the same company. As of 1.2 it's still very new so of course not a lot of content is still out but as much of the story as we've seen... it's pretty interesting. Edit as of 02.2025: Powercreep is insane, storyline a yapfest with no skip button (!!), rng everywhere. I have given up on it, pity.
Started off great but the game keeps getting more and more predatory. I wouldn't recommend this game at all.

The lore and the characters are very well designed. However, are slowly becoming harder and harder like Genshin's Spiral Abyss. Update: What I feared had happened, older units are no longer able to clear MOC due to enemy HP inflation. Good thing I stopped spending money on this game from the beginning. To newer players, thinks twice before spending money on any Hoyo games because the characters you spend so much time and effort to build will become irrelevant very quickly.

3.4 - Buffed characters but changed the stats they scale off of which causes months of farmed gear to feel worthless. They added the ability to change to back to the old scaling probably to avoid being sued, the buffed unit is much stronger, however all of the farming you did previously is worthless if you want to use the new version of the character.
